name: refineui-system-icons
description: Refine UI System Icons - Microsoft Fluent UI System Icons 구조를 참고한 아이콘 시스템

scripts.install:packages: npm install --workspace=@refineui/react-icons && npm install --workspace=@refineui/react-native-icons && npm install --workspace=@refineui/icons-web
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=@refineui/react-icons && npm run build --workspace=@refineui/react-native-icons && npm run build --workspace=@refineui/icons-web && npm run build:font
scripts.publish:packages: npm publish --workspace=@refineui/react-icons && npm publish --workspace=@refineui/react-native-icons && npm publish --workspace=@refineui/icons-web

author: Pelagornis
